en.title: High‑detail tattoos in Tampa
en.subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
en.aftercare_html:
1. Leave the protective film 24–48h.
  2. Wash gently with neutral soap; pat dry.
  3. Apply a thin layer of unscented moisturizer 2–3× daily.
  4. Avoid sun, pools, and tight clothes for 2 weeks.

es.title: Tatuajes de alto detalle en Tampa
es.subtitle: Reserva online y aftercare con membrana protectora (Saniderm/Emalla).
es.aftercare_html:
1. Deja la membrana protectora 24–48h.
  2. Lava con jabón neutro; seca sin frotar.
  3. Aplica una capa fina de crema 2–3× al día.
  4. Evita sol, piscina y ropa ajustada por 2 semanas.
